A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Why rate it a great 5? Because half of these reviews are butthurt fanboys stating that the movie was \"not what they had planned for\" in their fragile little heads.  The movie on its own base was very fresh and original\, giving some unique twists and removing a good amount of dead weight. Snoke is definitely a huge dead weight\, a second-rate emperor that felt not only extremely CGI but also took lime light away from the good characters and events such as Kylo and the rebellion. Honestly\, I don't like the hate this movie is getting from nothing less than fan-boy tantrums.
